title: Listen to a 'CD' made from fool's gold, powered by a Raspberry Pi
text:
Published By: Joystiq.com - Xbox - Today 
What's music to some is noise to others. And that's perhaps most apparent with Ra the latest piece from the creator of an 8-bit camera gun, ...
